channel.title: How do i get my server Online ? Please Help me and others that need
channel.description:
Hello, i have been trying to make my server since January. i have made my website so have a look if you want, [url=http://www.reidence-Scape.tk]www.reidence-Scape.tk[/url] / [url=http://www.residence-Scape.synthasite.com]www.residence-Scape.synthasite.com[/url] but everytime i try and log on to it or put it on moparscape serverstatus page it say's my server is not online. so how do i ut it online ?
please help
Residence :)

item.title: How do i get my server Online ? Please Help me and others that need
item.dc:creator: @Residence Residence
item.description:
@Residence wrote:

hello
thanks for the help but i have portforward already, and i can’t get the utorrent thing to work it does’nt come up with connection to port: 43594 or anything like that
thanks for the help but if u have any other idea’s please say.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get my server Online ? Please Help me and others that need
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

the best way and easy way to get a server up and running is as follows:
go to www.google.com, and search Utorrent download. once u have this all downloaded make it a icon on you’re desktop. do not touch it yet. no go to www.no-ip.com, and on the website register. once u are all registerd, click the thing that says “add New host”. now type in you’re host name than click add host at the bottom. it should show th IP adress that u just typed in. no click download and download no-ip. once u have both this downloaded follow this in order:

  1. open up start and find “run” or if you’re on vista type this in on search. search no-ip DUC.
  2. once u have ran no-ip DUC, u will see on the bottom toolbar a little thing that has a circle, and the letter Ip with a line through it.
  3. double click it and click on the check box that will appear next to you’re host name.
  4. next, open up you’re source folder and find “run.bat” or just “run”
  5. next, open up u torrent and click on the play button. minimize no-ip and utorrent.
  6. next, exit out of run.bat. than open up you’re source file, compile, and run it again.
  7. if you’re server is online it will says Connection to port: 43594.
  8. open up moparscape or silab or w/e it is that you’re running on and type in the ip adress than u typed into no-ip.
    than just make a username n password n logg on! hope this helped.
    =Assassin=

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get my server Online ? Please Help me and others that need
item.dc:creator: @Soul-Scape Soul-Scape
item.description:
@Soul-Scape wrote:

You probably need to portforward. It is the only way that people will be able to connect to your server.

Go here

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Or here
http://www.portforward.com/

Hope this helped
